had finished her studies, Aids had taken the life of her father. Travelling back to take care of him, Liz Murray says she took some comfort in knowing that her father had died a sober man. When someone gets sober, it's almost like meeting them for the first time. "Just before he passed away, he wrote me this card. "He wrote in the card, "Lizzy, I left my dreams behind a long time ago.
